price: 14. Que non ! Ce sont plutôt leurs actions qui ont voilé leurs cœurs.
arabic: كَلَّاۖ بَلۡۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُواْ يَكۡسِبُونَ

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: kallā bal rāna ʿalā qulūbihim mā kānū yaksibūna
